meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Douglas Okey Jenifer Scott Eric Floyd Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4117.

td.p: Douglas Okey, a teacher from West Peoria, Illinois
Jenifer Scott, a freelance writer and legal transcriptionist from Loudoun County, Virginia
Eric Floyd, a college student from Calhoun, Georgia (whose 3-day cash winnings total $70,200)

tr.td: LITERARY TRILOGIES
THE CANDY COUNTER
YANKEES' NUMBERS
PEARL HARBOR
PUT UP YOUR DUKES
"JUMP" FOR JOY
